full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Plumbing and Heating Services for the Lacombe Research and Development Centre

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) seeks bids for plumbing and heating services at its Lacombe Research and Development Centre in Lacombe, Alberta. The selected contractor must provide these services on an "as and when requested" basis for a period of one year, with options for extension for up to three additional years.

### Contract Details
* Contract Type: Request for Proposal
* Tender Number: 01R11-24-C006
* Closing Date: June 6, 2023, 4:00 PM MDT
* Contract Period: August 1, 2023, to July 31, 2024, with three additional one-year extensions
* Solicitation Documents: Available in English and French on the Canada Business Network website

### Key Requirements
* The contractor must hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS granted or approved by AAFC for personnel accessing sensitive work sites.
* A mandatory site visit has been scheduled for June 14, 2023, at 10:00 a.m. MDT. Bidders must confirm attendance and provide the names of individuals attending.
* Bids will be evaluated on the basis of both technical and financial criteria.

### Evaluation Criteria
* Mandatory Technical Requirements:
	+ Compliance with the requirements outlined in the solicitation documents
	+ Meeting all mandatory technical evaluation criteria
* Lowest Evaluated Price (LEP) - the responsive bid with the lowest price will be recommended for award

### Submission Instructions
* Bids must be submitted in either English or French, and a physical copy of the bid must be accompanied by an electronic version in a CD or DVD format.
* The bid must be delivered to the designated location by the closing date and time stated above.

### Important Notes
* Canada reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Notification of the final award will be made by AAFC, and the selected contractor will be notified in writing.
* The contractor must comply with all applicable laws and regulations, including those related to Indigenous procurement.

Contact information for the contracting officer is available on the Canada Business Network website.
